Page Two
UNESCO requested three representatives from the United States
—from three sources: network or foundation, commercial tele¬
vision station, educational television station; nomination of
experts; suggestions for observers. Existence of latter ca¬
pacity may or may not be finally approved for the London meet¬
ing 5-24 July, 1954.
Item 5 April 7. Page 1,,,Constitution Committee to work with Cohn and
Marks.
How can the committee achieve results until basic agreement on
NAEB function and goals is worked out?
